Articles.Content:
I'm trying the career mode at the moment and I'm confused with the maneuver node availability. I've upgraded the tracking station to level 2 (allow for patched conics in the description). On the orbital map, my trajectories are now blue (they were grey before), but I cannot create a maneuver node. Are there other requirements to be able to create one besides upgrading the tracking station? My pilot has 1 star if that matter.

Edited December 19, 2014 by Moohbear
I believe you need to to upgrade mission control to level 2 in addition to the tracking station.
Yup. It's a little non-obvious: Mission Control for manoeuvre nodes, Tracking Station for patched conics.

Yup. It's a little non-obvious: Mission Control for manoeuvre nodes, Tracking Station for patched conics.

Thank you! I was going nuts over this. Proudly bought patched conics and was sorely disappointed...
lol, I forget to upgrade mission control to level 2 , ...... this is the reason   .....
